page.title: 05Transport_public
page.content: The area is served by buses of Western S.M.T. based at Kilmarnock. The earliest bus from Kilmarnock Bus Station to Onthank _ 6.30am to Kilmaurs _ 5.45am Between 9am and 6pm there is a 10 min. service on most local routes. From the town centre to Kilmaurs it costs 45p (25p for children). A special 5-day ticket is available which allows passengers to travel 10 journeys for the price of 8. Children under 5yrs may travel free. Old-Age-Pensioners and handicapped people may travel up to a distance of 10 mls. for 12p.(Not before 9am or between 4pm and 6pm) Employees of Western Scottish are entitled to a free pass. Their wives and families may travel for half price.
